resource.name: covid-19-test-count
resource.title: COVID-19 Tests Performed
resource.description: The total number of patients for whom a test for COVID-19 was ordered.

resource.name: covid-19-test-positive-count
resource.title: COVID-19 Positive Tests
resource.description: The total number of patients for whom a positive result for a COVID-19 test was documented.

resource.name: numTotBeds
resource.title: All Hospital Beds
resource.description: Total number of all Inpatient and outpatient beds, including all staffed, ICU, licensed, and overflow(surge) beds used for inpatients or outpatients.

resource.name: numbeds
resource.title: Hospital Inpatient Beds
resource.description: Inpatient beds, including all staffed, licensed, and overflow(surge) beds used for inpatients.

resource.name: numBedsOcc
resource.title: Hospital Inpatient Bed Occupancy
resource.description: Total number of staffed inpatient beds that are occupied.

resource.name: numICUBeds
resource.title: Hospital ICU Beds
resource.description: Total number of staffed inpatient intensive care unit (ICU) beds.

resource.name: numICUBedsOcc
resource.title: Hospital ICU Bed Occupancy
resource.description: Total number of staffed inpatient ICU beds that are occupied.

resource.name: numVentUse
resource.title: Mechanical Ventilators In Use
resource.description: Total number of ventilators in use.

resource.name: numC19HospPats
resource.title: COVID-19 Patients Hospitalized
resource.description: Patients currently hospitalized in an inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID-19.

resource.name: numC19MechVentPats
resource.title: COVID-19 Patients Hospitalized and Ventilated
resource.description: Patients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location who have suspected or confirmed COVID - 19 and are on a mechanical ventilator.

resource.name: numC19HOPats
resource.title: COVID-19 Hospital Onset
resource.description: Patients hospitalized in an NHSN inpatient care location with onset of suspected or confirmed COVID - 19 14 or more days after hospitalization.

resource.name: numC19OverflowPats
resource.title: ED/Overflow
resource.description: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed.

resource.name: numC19OFMechVentPats
resource.title: ED/Overflow and ventilated
resource.description: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID - 19 who are in the ED or any overflow location awaiting an inpatient bed and on a mechanical ventilator.

resource.name: covid-19-recovered
resource.title: COVID-19 Patients Recovered
resource.description: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who have recovered and been discharged.

resource.name: numC19Died
resource.title: COVID-19 Patients Died
resource.description: Patients with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 who died in the hospital, ED, or any overflow location.
